item.title: FarCry Roadmap from 2004
item.dc:creator: Geoff Bowers
item.content:encoded:
Stumbled across this little blast from the past: the FarCry Roadmap from 2004, just one year out from our initial release to open source in April 2003. Since that time we've been averaging a major point release about every 9 months.

The most recent FarCry 6.2.3 (codename: Fandango) is quite literally a far cry from those humble beginnings.  We've been looking closely at the roadmap for FarCry 7 over the last couple of weekly breakfasts, and would like to have a beta out to folks in time for our 10 year anniversary in April 2013.

Stay tuned :)
